summary: Having recently escaped the clutches of a hippie sex cult, a beautiful model is pursued by a serial killer whose previous victims include former occupants of her new apartment.
cast: Edwige Fenech|George Hilton|Paola Quattrini|Giampiero Albertini|Franco Agostini|Oreste Lionello|Ben Carra|Carla Brait|Gianni Pulone|Carla Mancini|George Rigaud|Annabella Incontrera|Ettore Arena|Antonio Basile|Antonio Calò|Dolores Calò|Fausto Di Bella|Evi Farinelli|Alfonso Giganti|Daniela Giordano|Giuseppe Marcocu|Nadia Marsala|Romano Milani|Enzo Mondino|Francesco Narducci|Gennarino Pappagalli|Filippo Perego|Luciano Pigozzi|Pasquale Ragno|Franco Ricci|Maria Tedeschi
title: Las lágrimas de Jennifer
